Text:
"I personally found the OST released by Koch entitled: American Psycho: Music From The Controversial Motion Picture, composed and compiled by John Cale, lacked the very essence of the original tracks found to be part of the motion picture"

i agree 100% thanks for making this

My pleasure...

My tribute to a great film, a great novel, a great piece of Americana and a more-than-ever relevant critique and satire of a culture in demise.

Very nice work.

A culture in decline indeed.  It looks even worse from this side of the border!  If only the weather up there were warmer I'd become an expatriate.  

The way things are going with climate change time is on my side.  :)
cant tell how much i appreciate your work. thank you friend!
